description: The moderator intervenes because the participant struggles to complete a task, wanders of task or goes too deep into a task or the systems crashes.
The query input options are clear in general.
Visualizing the data as a heat map, box plot and/or polar plot is useful and simple.
A word or expression that appears in a paragraph is not clear or used appropriately.
The task description does not accurately represent the process that needs to be completed for the user
The event-environmental data table is understandable
Data and metadata generated are simple and easy to export
The information in the data provenance table is understandable
Control+F function to look for specific elements in the metadata is simple and easy for the user
The metadata buttons and/or display process are confusing.
The query process and execution is clear.
The content, axis ticks and labels of the plots are not clear.
The participants needs to read the task(s) again.
The query process and the sequence and meaning of the query inputs are not understood.

tag: Metadata content not useful or confusing
description: The information provided in the data provenance table, data lineage and/or full metadata exploration windows is not useful or confusing.
Hiding, restoring and ordering the columns and values in the data table improves the usability of the table
The participant requests additional explanation for a feature, visualization or text description.
The user identifies a system issue as taking long to load, crash or not responsive.
The text and diagram information in the home tab facilitate the overall understanding of process underpinned by the UI.
After reading the explanatory paragraph the data table cell background colors are understood
Exporting the data for a subsequent analysis is useful
The pagination, sorting and X features of the table are confusing.
The event concept and terminology are not understood as they are confused with number of cases
The participant starts or completes a task before the assigned order.
The content from the data provenance, data lineage and/or full metadata windows is clear and/or useful.
The user cannot find the referred tab quickly
The tooltips, text and drop downs (multi)inputs help the user in understanding the query process.
The user logs in to the dashboard easily and quickly
The data set filenames are not clear or confusing.
The interactivity of the plots is appreciated by the participant.
The user clicks on an information link leading to the exploration of additional sources besides the dashboard.
When hovering over the column heading of the data table some variables are missing the information tooltip
Explicit interest in the event types or locations available.
The export file format and name are unknown or not clear.
The plots from different queries can be compared easily.
The export buttons for (meta)data are not immediately recognized or identified by the user
The query input options and variables from the drop downs should be sorted alphabetically.
Tab generation process after submitting a query
The sources of the data sets are unknown, not understood in the metadata and/or data table.
The participants makes a comment about the speed in completing the tasks.
